thread.section_title: Starfire Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Starfire Direct | starfiredirect.com
thread.title: Susie Gaffney
thread.title_full: Starfire Direct reviewed by Susie Gaffney

author: Susie Gaffney
title: Susie Gaffney
text: I was a little skeptical about ordering a relatively expensive fire pit online, but I truly fell in love with one particular piece I saw, and actually, the price seemed fair, given the perceived quality and gorgeous design. The customer service I received from Starfire Direct was excellent, from the rep I ordered from, to the delivery and follow-up. The fire pit surpassed my expectations - it's even more gorgeous in person, and emits more than enough heat to keep us toasty warm on those brisk Northern California evenings. I'd definitely recommend this company and their top-notch customer service and products.
